help-file.title: SKILL_ALCHEMIST
help-file.content:
The following is a list of all the skills available to the Alchemist class.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 1st level: 1h bludgeon, 2h bludgeon, bandage, carve, climb, craft, dodge, double attack, first aid, fishing, fix, lore, mine, mix, mount, parry, remix, retreat, throwpotion 31st level: spellbind 51st level: encrust 56th level: enchant
Potions --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 6th level: Nitrogen 11th level: Faerie Fire, Anti-magic 16th level: Wither 21st level: Slow 26th level: Living Stone, Grease 31st level: Napalm, Feeblemind 36th level: Fly, Explosives 41st level: Entangle, Strong Acid 51st level: Greater Living Stone
Alchemist Specializations --------------------------------------------------------------------------- Battle-Forger, Blacksmith
